description: Try our easy to follow Mouse Ears Cookie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mouse Ears Cookie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170°C/150°C fan forced. Grease and line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Using an electric mixer, beat WESTERN STAR CHEF’S CHOICE Butter and CSR Brown Sugar until pale and creamy, add egg; beat until just combined. Stir in WHITE WINGS flour, NESTLE BAKERS’ CHOICE Cocoa Powder & NESTLE BAKERS’ CHOICE Milk CHOC BITS. Mix until well combined.
Roll level tablespoons of mixture into balls; place 4cm apart on prepared trays; gently press down on cookies to flatten slightly. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden.

Remove cookies from oven, & while dough is still warm and soft, use a small sharp knife to make a small cut in the cookie, give the knife a little wiggle to open up the cut just a little, be careful here not to wiggle to much or you may tear the cookie in half. Leave on trays to cool completely.

Place NESTLE BAKERS’ CHOICE White Melts in a small microwaveable safe bowl; microwave uncovered on MEDIUM (50%) for 1 minute; stir. Repeat process in 30 second intervals until melted and smooth; add 1-2 drop of QUEEN Gel Food Colouring Red and stir to tint Melts pink.
Use a spoon to dollop a little of the pink Melts on cookie and smooth over to cover the middle of the cookie, as pictured. Repeat with remaining cookies.
Use black marker to make mouse faces on serving glasses. Gently slot two cookies over the edge of a serving glass, fill with milk, and serve.
